title: Clinical Practice Competency Enhancement: Customized Microlearning Design Based on Mathematical Learning Behavior Patterns

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least four math learning behavior patterns (e.g., synchronized, avoidance-oriented, etc.)
Learners can evaluate PISA research-based behavioral traits (success expectancy, value perception, environmental support) with 80% accuracy
Learners can design at least two personalized learning strategies by analyzing their own behavior patterns
Learners complete 5-minute microlearning modules in mobile environments with a 90%+ completion rate
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
